## Block.setNextStatement() method

Set whether another block can chain onto the bottom of this block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setNextStatement(newBoolean: boolean, opt_check?: string | string[] | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newBoolean | boolean | True if there can be a next statement. |
|  opt\_check | string \| string\[\] \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> Statement type or list of statement types. Null/undefined if any type could be connected. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
